item.title: 印度今年最受欢迎的大型 IPO 即将开始交易
item.description: Urban Co. 将于周三在孟买开始交易，此前该公司完成了印度今年超额认购最多的大型首次公开募股。【原文：Urban Co. will begin trading in Mumbai on Wednesday after wrapping up India’s most oversubscribed major initial public offering this year.】

item.title: 亚洲股指再创新高，驱动因素远不止中国
item.description: 亚洲股市在四年多的时间里首次创下历史新高，对中国依赖程度的降低被认为是这轮反弹的持久动力。【原文：Asian equities have reached their first record high in more than four years, with a reduced reliance on China seen underpinning the rally’s staying power.】

item.title: 腾讯、百度出售创纪录点心债券以获取廉价资金
item.description: 中国互联网公司正在香港点心债券市场上筹集创纪录的资金，因为它们希望获得廉价融资，为其人工智能雄心壮志提供动力。【原文：Chinese internet firms are raising a record amount of funds in Hong Kong’s dim sum bond market, as they look to secure cheap financing to power their artificial intelligence ambitions.】

item.title: 美国科技股热潮过后，香港日内交易者追逐杠杆 ETF
item.description: 今年夏天，Pat Miao 辞去了香港办公室的工作，她获得了其他东西：有时间在华尔街最狂野的角落之一进行交易。现年 30 岁的她目前在一些基金上下注，这些基金的日回报率是特斯拉公司、AT&T 公司等热门美国科技股的两倍或三倍。【原文：When Pat Miao walked away from her Hong Kong office job this summer, she gained something else: time to trade in one of Wall Street’s wildest corners. The 30-year-old now wagers on funds that offer double or triple the daily returns of popular US tech stocks such as Tesla Inc.】

item.title: 美元在 FOMC 利率决议前接近三年低点
item.description: 在美联储做出决定之前，彭博社的美元指数接近2022年3月以来的最低水平，预计决策者将继续降息，以支撑疲软的劳动力市场。【原文：Bloomberg’s gauge of the dollar approached its lowest level since March 2022 ahead of the Federal Reserve decision where policymakers are expected to resume cutting interest rates to prop up a weakening labor market.】

item.title: 新西兰经常账户缺口因特穆效应大幅缩小
item.description: 新西兰的经常账户赤字在进口额下调后大幅收窄，原因是Temu等电子商务零售商寄来了更多低价值的包裹。【原文：New Zealand’s current account deficit has narrowed dramatically after a downward revision to imports because of more low-value parcels arriving from e-commerce retailers like Temu.】

item.title: 美联储利率决议前美元下挫，黄金维持在历史记录附近
item.description: 受交易员对周三美联储会议降息的押注提振，黄金保持了最近的涨势，首次突破每盎司 3,700 美元。【原文：Gold held its latest gains that saw it rise above $3,700 an ounce for the first time, boosted by traders’ bets for a rate cut at Wednesday’s Federal Reserve meeting.】

item.title: Five Point 支持的 WaterBridge 在扩大 IPO 规模后融资 6.34 亿美元
item.description: WaterBridge Infrastructure LLC 在美国的首次公开募股中募集了 6.34 亿美元，其股票定价为市场区间的最高价。【原文：WaterBridge Infrastructure LLC raised $634 million in its upsized US initial public offering, pricing its shares at the top of a marketed range.】

item.title: 美国出口下滑，日本出口连续第四个月下降
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策继续给全球商业，尤其是涉美贸易的前景蒙上阴影，日本出口连续第四个月下降。【原文：Japan’s exports fell for the fourth consecutive month as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs continued to cloud the prospects for global commerce, especially for trade involving the US.】

item.title: 关注俄罗斯供应风险，石油维持三日涨势
item.description: 由于交易商在评估乌克兰对俄罗斯原油基础设施的袭击所造成的影响，石油在连续三日上涨后趋于平稳。【原文：Oil steadied after a three-day gain as traders assess the fallout from Ukrainian attacks on Russian crude infrastructure.】

item.title: 印尼将维持利率不变，商业银行独立成为焦点：指南
item.description: 在抗议活动导致总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）收紧对权力的控制数周后，印尼正在重启财政和货币引擎，在周三做出维持利率稳定的预期决定之前，再次引发了人们对中央银行独立性的担忧。【原文：Indonesia is revving up fiscal and monetary engines weeks after protests led President Prabowo Subianto to tighten his grip on power, reviving concerns over central bank independence ahead of an expected decision Wednesday to hold interest rates steady.】

item.title: 美国、加拿大和墨西哥启动贸易协定磋商
item.description: 美国和墨西哥周二宣布，美国、加拿大和墨西哥将在明年对其地区性贸易协定 USMCA 进行高风险审查之前正式开始磋商。【原文：The US, Canada and Mexico are set to formally begin consultations ahead of the high-stakes review of their regional USMCA trade accord next year, the US and Mexico announced Tuesday.】

item.title: 政治风险肆虐，日本面临艰难的 20 年期债券拍卖
item.description: 由于政治不确定性和挥之不去的财政风险使期限较长的国债持续承压，日本投资者正准备迎接一场充满挑战的 20 年期国债拍卖。【原文：Investors in Japan are bracing for a challenging 20-year government bond auction, as political uncertainty and lingering fiscal risks keep longer-dated debt under pressure.】

item.title: StubHub 首次公开募股定价为每股 23.50 美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，StubHub 控股公司的首次公开募股定价为市场定价区间的中点。【原文：StubHub Holdings Inc. is pricing its initial public offering at the midpoint of a marketed range, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 基金称亚洲股市创纪录涨势或因关税影响而瓦解
item.description: 该地区一些最大的基金表示，随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提高关税开始削弱盈利，亚洲股市破纪录的涨势将面临越来越大的压力。【原文：The record-breaking rally in Asian stocks is set to come under increasing pressure as Donald Trump’s tariff hikes start to sap earnings, some of the region’s biggest funds say.】

item.title: 香港领导人将在施政报告中重点阐述经济问题
item.description: 香港领导人将在周三发表的施政报告中重点关注经济和民生问题，其中包括可能加快与中国发展跨境科技中心的计划。【原文：Hong Kong’s leader will focus on the economy and livelihood issues in his policy address on Wednesday, including a potential plan to speed up the development of a cross-border tech hub with China.】

item.title: 美联储降息标志着转向就业市场：决策日指南
item.description: 预计美联储官员周三将通过降低利率来支持岌岌可危的美国劳动力市场，这标志着在对关税引发的通胀的担忧使美联储官员全年都按兵不动之后，美联储官员的立场发生了转变。【原文：Federal Reserve officials are expected to backstop a faltering US labor market by lowering interest rates Wednesday, marking a shift after worries about tariff-induced inflation kept them on hold all year.】

item.title: 亚洲股市低迷，投资者静待美联储：市场综述
item.description: 由于投资者在周三美联储利率决议前按兵不动，继华尔街股市不温不火之后，亚洲股市将迎来一个低迷的开端。【原文：Asian stocks are poised for a sluggish start following a tepid Wall Street session, as investors hold back ahead of Wednesday’s Federal Reserve rate decision.】

item.title: 中国奇瑞汽车在香港首次公开募股中寻求高达 12 亿美元的投资
item.description: 奇瑞汽车股份有限公司正寻求在香港首次公开募股中筹集高达 91 亿港元（12 亿美元）的资金，从而拉开了这个金融中心大型企业上市旺季的序幕。【原文：Chery Automobile Co. is seeking to raise as much as HK$9.1 billion ($1.2 billion) in a Hong Kong initial public offering, kicking off what’s shaping up to be a busy season for big listings in the financial hub.】

item.title: 美国调查小组调查华为子公司与英伟达共享办公地点一事
item.description: 美国国会议员要求被列入黑名单的中国公司华为技术有限公司的子公司 Futurewei 解释为何与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：US lawmakers are asking Futurewei, a subsidiary of the blacklisted Chinese firm Huawei Technologies Co., to explain why it shared buildings in Silicon Valley with Nvidia Corp., thrusting the US chipmaker into the crossfire of an investigation into possible Chinese espionage.】

item.title: 破产金融科技公司就难以获得的私人公司股份达成协议
item.description: 倒闭的金融科技初创公司 Linqto Inc. 同意达成一项协议，向被错误承诺可以获得难以收购的私营公司股份的客户退款。【原文：Collapsed fintech startup Linqto Inc. agreed to a deal to repay customers who were wrongly promised that they could get stakes in hard-to-acquire, private companies.】

item.title: 空桌、低利润显示中国餐饮外卖大战的代价
item.description: 由于外卖平台之间激烈的价格战，中国消费者只能喝到 14 美分的咖啡，吃到 50 美分的饭菜，餐馆和茶叶连锁店正在计算人流量减少的成本。【原文：As Chinese consumers snag 14-cent coffees and 50-cent meals thanks to a fierce price war among food delivery platforms, restaurants and tea chains are counting the cost of vanishing footfalls.】

item.title: 微软和 OpenAI 以人工智能承诺迎接特朗普的英国之行
item.description: 微软公司、OpenAI 和其他美国公司宣布计划斥资数百亿美元在英国建设技术基础设施，这是一系列商业交易的一部分，恰逢唐纳德-特朗普总统本周访问英国。【原文：Microsoft Corp., OpenAI and other American companies announced plans to spend tens of billions of dollars on technology infrastructure in the UK, part of a series of business deals that coincide with President Donald Trump’s visit to the nation this week.】

item.title: 家长在参议院听证会上抨击 OpenAI 和 Character.AI 的安全问题
item.description: 今年春天自杀身亡的一名青少年的父亲周二在国会发表了情绪激动的证词，指控 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT "诱导 "他 16 岁的儿子自杀，该公司将速度和市场份额置于青少年安全之上。【原文：The father of a teenager who died by suicide this spring delivered emotional congressional testimony Tuesday, alleging OpenAI’s ChatGPT “groomed” his 16-year-old son to take his own life and the company prioritized speed and market share over youth safety.】

item.title: 前美国统计局局长讲述因就业数据被炒鱿鱼的震惊经历
item.description: 上个月被解雇的劳工统计局局长艾丽卡-麦肯塔弗（Erika McEntarfer）说，白宫在一封简短的电子邮件中正式通知她被解雇，这让她感到非常意外。【原文：Erika McEntarfer, who was fired as commissioner of the Bureau of Labor Statistics last month, said official notice of her dismissal came as a complete surprise in a short email from the White House.】

item.title: GPIF 首次自主投资日本房地产和基础设施项目
item.description: 日本政府养老金投资基金首次自行选择国内另类资产基金，将现金投向房地产和数据中心等基础设施。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund is picking domestic alternative asset funds on its own for the first time, putting its cash in real estate and infrastructure such as data centers.】

item.title: 秘鲁国会将讨论博卢阿尔特转向后新的养老金提取方案
item.description: 秘鲁国会将讨论是否允许人们从私人养老基金中进行新一轮提款。【原文：Peru’s congress will discuss whether to let people make a new round of withdrawals from private pension funds.】

item.title: 因担心供应过剩，基金押注圣诞节前油价下跌 25
item.description: 一位交易商大举押注布伦特原油将在今年年底跌破每桶 50 美元，认为不断增长的供应量将超过从乌克兰到中东的地缘政治风险。【原文：One trader loaded up on bets that Brent crude will fall below $50 a barrel by the end of year, wagering that growing supply will outweigh geopolitical risks from Ukraine to the Middle East.】

item.title: 人工智能时代网络威胁加剧，Netskope 首次公开募股受追捧
item.description: 对人工智能将迫使公司在安全软件上花费更多资金的担忧，正在推动对 Netskope 公司首次公开募股的需求。【原文：Fears that artificial intelligence will force companies to spend more on security software are helping to drive demand for Netskope Inc.’s initial public offering.】

item.title: 债券交易员押注美联储年底前降息半点
item.description: 债券交易商正在加大期权赌注，认为美联储将在今年剩余的三次政策会议上至少降息半个百分点。【原文：Bond traders are stepping up options wagers that the Federal Reserve will deliver at least one half-point interest-rate cut across this year’s three remaining policy meetings.】
